title: 3 zodiac signs likely to disappoint you in relationships
text:
Next Story : 9 ethnic styles you should try this festive season

Disappointments in relationships are hard to cope with. You can be let down by your partner's infidelity or by his refusal to commit. Or maybe your partner is so committed to his career that he is willing to let his relationships suffer. And if your partner belongs to any of these zodiac signs, he or she is likely to let you down more than others will:People belonging to this zodiac sign love to analyse things, which is fine. But sometimes they overanalyse things. Moreover, they want everything perfect in a relationship. Their obsession with perfection can make you feel frustrated.Ego can be their biggest enemy when it comes to relationships. They might not admit to committing mistakes and that can lead to an eternal cesspool of relationship woes. On top of everything, they can be extra sensitive.They can be a bit self-centred and secretive. Patience isn't their forte, and they are likely to move on, if they feel bogged down by responsibilities in a relationship.
description: If your partner belongs to any of these zodiac signs, he or she is likely to let you down more than others will. These are the unique traits you should be wary
